twoSetSkill.name: Shadow Shield 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Receive a shield upon entering the battlefield that can absorb all DMG equal to 15% of the host's Max HP (max: 1800 HP). While the shield is in effect, the host gains 40% Crit DMG. When broken, the shield reappears after 15s.

threeSetSkill.name: Shadow Blade 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Melee attacks gain 20% Total DMG Multiplier.
